mapper.select: select artist.artist_name from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no join playlist_content playlist_content on playlist_content.s_no = sound.s_no and playlist_content.a_no = sound.a_no where playlist_content.m_id=#{m_id} and playlist_content.l_no=#{l_no}
